price: 2. Y sigue lo que tu Señor te ha revelado. En verdad, Al-lah está bien informado de los que hacen.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kāna bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
